data.title: Milind Soman gets married to Ankita Konwar
data.meta_description: Bajirao Mastani and Paiyaa fame Milind Soman gets married to his 27 year old lady love Ankita Konwar at Alibaug
data.text:
Milind Soman is a popular actor and model, who acts in Hindi, Tamil and Telugu films. Films like Bajirao Mastani, Paiyaa, David, and Alex Pandian, are to his credit.

Milind has now got hitched to his lady love Ankita Konwar, this morning at Alibaug. Milind, who is 52 years old, was criticised for dating a girl, who is just 27 years old. However, the couple did not mind about the criticizations and have proved that age is just a number. The pictures from their wedding are getting viral on social media.

This is Milind's second marriage, after getting divorced from Mylene Jampanoi, a French actress in 2009.
